item.description:
Some people attending Dominion Night at Sandy's have requested a night specifically for Kingdom Builder so let's do this.  This is a fairly straightforward game so it is easy to learn if you have never played before. :-)

If someone else who owns the game and is willing to bring it signs up, I will add another 4 people to the RSVP list.

---

Food:

Drinks will be provided.  Please consider bringing a lite refreshment to share, and/or eating dinner prior to joining us.

---

About the location:

This event will be hosted at a private residence, conveniently located at the intersections of Route 1 and Route 95.  If you need directions, just ask.  This is a housing complex, so please do NOT park in any numbered spaces.  There are no animals on the premises and the property should be child-friendly.  Look for Unit 901 since Meetup doesn't display addresses correctly! :-(

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Mini-Meetup: Kingdom Builder
